alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued January 14 at 8:27PM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM SATURDAY TO 7 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Moderate coastal flooding expected with water levels 2 to 4 feet above normally dry ground around the time of high tide. * WHERE...Coastal Jefferson, Coastal Wakulla and Coastal Taylor Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM Saturday to 7 PM EST Sunday. High tide is around 1230 AM Sunday with another high tide around 2 PM Sunday. * IMPACTS...Water levels will increase Saturday evening. Numerous roads along the coast will flood and become impassible. Structures near the coast not elevated will be prone to flooding. Some particularly vulnerable areas include Mashes Sands Beach, Spring Creek, St Marks, Nutall Rise, and Keaton Beach.
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla
